name: PADALA
description:
The art entitled "PADALA" directly translated into n. remittance; parcel;
A lot of Filipino work abroad to sustain their family needs. "BALIKBAYAN BOX" symbolizes the hard work made throughout months of buying and going into a sale filling the box of material goods., also, it's a box of unconditional love. Not everyone celebrates Christmas with a complete family, especially OFW "Overseas Filipino Worker", they often suffer from homesickness.

My father is OFW working for almost three-decade, he missed a lot of special events like Christmas and I know it's hard for him to be lonely.
He may not expressive with his feeling but I know from the look in his eyes, the pain, loss moments that he endured for his family.

I dedicate this artwork to all individuals who work abroad.
